医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明，COVID-19 和 COVID-19 疫苗接种对偏头痛严重程度的影响可以忽略不计《欧洲神经病学杂志》上发表的研究表明，COVID-19 和 COVID-19 疫苗接种对偏头痛严重程度的影响可以忽略不计。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/COVID-19-and-COVID-19-vaccination-have-negligible-effects-on-migraine-severity-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/COVID-19-and-COVID-19-vaccination-have-negligible-effects-on-migraine-severity-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c0cb1a3-0bcd-47e1-8fb5-fa6cb0d5daa3 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 16:08:28 -0400 COVID-19 and COVID-19 vaccination have negligible effects on migraine severity, research shows
新分析研究了美国青少年使用阿片类药物的比例一项新的分析显示，近年来美国青少年的阿片类药物处方率有所下降，主要限于非手术适应症。手术的阿片类药物处方率保持稳定。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/New-analysis-looks-at-rates-of-opioid-prescribing-to-US-adolescents.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/New-analysis-looks-at-rates-of-opioid-prescribing-to-US-adolescents.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b75ca4a3-2a60-49f8-bde2-5785f783dc95 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 15:58:04 -0400 New analysis looks at rates of opioid prescribing to US adolescents
关于棕色脂肪神经通路的新发现可能会导致肥胖症的治疗加州大学洛杉矶分校领导的一个研究小组发现了供应棕色脂肪组织（BAT）的神经通路，棕色脂肪组织是一种从脂肪代谢中释放化学能作为热量的组织，这一发现可能为使用它来治疗肥胖症和相关疾病铺平道路。代谢条件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/New-findings-about-nerve-pathways-to-brown-fat-could-lead-to-obesity-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/New-findings-about-nerve-pathways-to-brown-fat-could-lead-to-obesity-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41e50b73-05d1-4960-a448-f08f5081eb6b Thu, 05 Oct 2023 15:19:30 -0400 New findings about nerve pathways to brown fat could lead to obesity treatments
研究人员为患有罕见血管遗传性疾病的儿童找到了新的潜在治疗方法弗朗西斯·克里克研究所和大奥蒙德街医院 (GOSH)/伦敦大学学院大奥蒙德街儿童健康研究所的一个研究小组为患有罕见血管遗传性疾病的儿童找到了新的潜在治疗方法，这种疾病会导致严重的、终生的和致残的症状，例如癫痫发作和发育障碍。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Researchers-identify-new-pottial-treatments-for-children-with-rare-genic-conditions-of-blood-vessels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Researchers-identify-new-pottial-treatments-for-children-with-rare-genic-conditions-of-blood-vessels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acdfe122-75f9-4bcd-979b-9dbc3e045ccc Thu, 05 Oct 2023 15:06:33 -0400 Researchers identify new potential treatments for children with rare genetic conditions of blood vessels
研究人员发现免疫治疗耐药的三阴性乳腺癌的一个弱点范德比尔特-英格拉姆癌症中心的研究人员发现了自然杀伤细胞的药物靶点，可能会引发免疫治疗耐药的三阴性乳腺癌患者的治疗反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Researchers-discover-a-vulnerability-in-immunotherapy-pressive-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Researchers-discover-a-vulnerability-in-immunotherapy-pressive-triple-阴性-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=260081b8-60a1-40cb-a5e0-ce65139f38b1 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 14:54:51 -0400 Researchers discover a vulnerability in immunotherapy-resistant triple-negative breast cancer
新的计算方法可能有助于识别死亡风险较高的主动脉瓣狭窄患者梅奥诊所的研究人员开发了一种计算方法，可以帮助识别因该病死亡风险较高的中度主动脉瓣狭窄患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/New-calculation-may-help-identify-aortic-stenosis-病人-at-higher-risk-of-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/New-calculation-may-help-identify-aortic-stenosis-病人-at-higher-risk-of-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=932f4baf-d6af-4b95-ac79-854493e49f67 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 14:46:55 -0400 New calculation may help identify aortic stenosis patients at higher risk of death

优化方案以防止通过母体线粒体 DNA 残留传播疾病研究人员讨论了一种新技术，可以最大限度地降低线粒体 DNA 残留风险，从而预防遗传风险和临床线粒体疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Optimized-protocol-to-prevent-disease-transmission-through-maternal-mitochondrial-DNA-carryover.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Optimized-protocol-to-prevent-disease-transmission-through-maternal-mitochondrial-DNA-carryover.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87ffaa99-c3b3-4f76-9165-17d45dbf1158 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 13:30:00 -0400 Optimized protocol to prevent disease transmission through maternal mitochondrial DNA carryover
内分泌治疗对乳腺癌幸存者糖尿病的代谢影响研究人员讨论了内分泌治疗的历史，强调了它们的不良代谢影响，并强调需要更好的糖尿病生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/The-metabolic-effects-of-endocrine-therapy-on-diabetes-mellitus-in-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/The-metabolic-effects-of-endocrine-therapy-on-diabetes-mellitus-in-breast-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1ef2984-ff14-4cc8-b116-0f69c65c33c6 Thu, 05 Oct 2023 11:43:00 -0400 The metabolic effects of endocrine therapy on diabetes mellitus in breast cancer survivors
在有趣的研究中，音乐会观众的身体和情感同步研究人员检查了现场古典音乐会期间观众的生理和运动同步性，并探讨了它们与审美体验和个人性格特征的相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Concert-goers-sync-up-physically-and-emotionally-in-fascinating-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231005/Concert-goers-sync-up-physically-and-emotionally-in-fascinating-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e821f7e8-f477-4035-9da7-9968c95dac6d Thu, 05 Oct 2023 11:32:00 -0400 Concert-goers sync up physically and emotionally in fascinating study
